reason: As Orsolina Zanetti, a prosperous Facchino, my focus remains on shrewd commercial growth and building a network of reliable contacts within the trade sphere. ZenGiovane, sharing a similar background and guild affiliation, presents a prime opportunity for exploring collaborative trade ventures or discreet investment partnerships. This aligns perfectly with my need for practical, mutually beneficial relationships that avoid drawing undue attention from higher social classes, ensuring my continued rise through industriousness rather than ostentation.
